name: Vinu Balagopal A P
bio:
Software Developer | Finotes Inc
Former Fellow | GTech µLearn

top_projects.name: Gmail-Clone
top_projects.description: One of my teachers approached me when I was working on my college's final year project and asked if I could teach him about flutter and how to create cross-platform mobile apps.

top_projects.name: Android-Clean-Architecture
top_projects.description: This repository showcases an Android project employing Clean Architecture principles with Jetpack Compose, along with several important libraries and concepts such as Coroutines, Retrofit, KSP, ViewModel, Room Database, LiveData, and Hilt (Dagger 2).

top_projects.name: Quizizz-Server
top_projects.description: This is a simple quiz server which uses values as the questions that allows to get all questions and get it by using id.

profile_summary:
Vinu Balagopal A P is a highly skilled software developer with a strong foundation in programming languages, including Rust, C++, and Kotlin. With a professional network of over 103 followers, Vinu has established himself as a trusted and influential figure in the development community. His extensive experience and expertise in software development have enabled him to make significant contributions to the field, demonstrating his ability to design, develop, and deploy innovative solutions. As a former fellow at GTech µLearn and currently working at Finotes Inc, Vinu has honed his skills in a variety of settings, from educational institutions to industry-leading companies.

With a portfolio of 135 public repositories, Vinu has consistently demonstrated his commitment to active development and open-source collaboration. His technical proficiency, combined with his passion for innovation and problem-solving, makes him a valuable asset to any organization. As a seasoned software developer, Vinu is well-versed in the latest industry trends and technologies, allowing him to stay ahead of the curve and drive technological advancements. With his unique blend of technical expertise, professional achievements, and collaborative spirit, Vinu is poised to make a lasting impact in the world of software development, and his work is likely to inspire and influence others in the field.
